requirements.title: Create pre-commit hook script
acceptanceCriteria: Script uses bash with strict mode (set -euo pipefail)

requirements.title: Run cargo fmt check
acceptanceCriteria: Commit is blocked if code is not formatted
Clear error message indicates formatting failure

requirements.title: Run cargo clippy
acceptanceCriteria: Commit is blocked if clippy reports warnings
Clear error message indicates lint failure

requirements.title: Run cargo test
acceptanceCriteria: Commit is blocked if any test fails
Clear error message indicates test failure

requirements.title: Support bypass for emergencies
acceptanceCriteria: Error messages include instructions for --no-verify bypass
